document_data.name: Black Banner Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Banner Inn''' was a popular establishment in [[Daerlun]], [[interior Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite dragon/287/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Shadowdark House|70}}
document_data.Location: This building was located on the west side of Daerlun near the Sunset Gate. Its main entrance was on the north side of the [[Street of the Dragon]] which connected the gate to the [[Westmarket]] and beyond.
document_data.Structure: From above, the building looked like a giant [[gauntlet]] laying on its side with the fingers curling around the central courtyard and the wrist/forearm part jutting off to the northeast.

Interior.Atmosphere: The lighting was muted throughout most of the establishment, making it fairly private but gloomy. Community dining and revelry was discouraged—guests were almost exclusively served food and drink in their rooms.

document_data.Services: The only exception was the grand lounge where businessfolk could meet and gambling tables were available. There, the clientele could enjoy fine vintages from the well-stocked wine cellar.
